docs.lead_paragraph: NOW, who would believe it, but this is surely the way they do it in Philadelphia, for The North American says so, and even gives a picture of the lady sitting at the dining table with an apple speared by her fork, while with a table knife she is peeling it. Alas and alack-a-day! she does look such a backwoods lady.
